faqs.question: What is the Optivus Protocol?
faqs.answer: Optivus Protocol is a decentralized, multi-tier affiliate marketing system. It allows users to earn commissions by referring others to the platform through a unique referral link.

faqs.question: How do I join?
faqs.answer: You can join by signing up and paying a one-time £50 entry fee. This activates your account and gives you a unique referral link to share where you then have access to the exclusive Discord to obtain rewards.

faqs.question: Is the £50 fee refundable?
faqs.answer: No, as stated in our Terms of Service, the entry fee is non-refundable. It is immediately used to fund the commission payouts and cover protocol operational costs.

faqs.question: Where is the sign up fee used for?
faqs.answer: Operational costs of the server and a large portion is given back to the community via OPTIV buy backs and distributed fairly in community competitions.

faqs.question: What is KYC?
faqs.answer: KYC (Know Your Customer) is a verification process required for fiat (bank) withdrawals to comply with financial regulations. It involves submitting identification documents. Crypto withdrawals do not require KYC.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. We use industry-standard measures to protect your data. For enhanced security, we strongly recommend enabling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) in your account settings.

faqs.question: How do I join Discord?
faqs.answer: Discord is reserved for those who sign up with our website OPTiVision where a direct link will be provided to ensure those who have contributed are the soul benefactors of the giveaways.

faqs.question: Do I have to invite people to join the competitions?
faqs.answer: No. Anyone who pays their one time fee will be able to take place in the competitions but the more people you bring the more entries you will get, increasing your odds of winning OPTIV giveaways.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, complete your KYC profile, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, and government-issued identification.
We also collect information automatically when you use our services, such as your IP address, device information, and transaction history on our platform.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Information
content: We use the information we collect to:
Provide, maintain, and improve our services;
Process transactions and send you related information, including confirmations and receipts;
Verify your identity and prevent fraud (KYC);
Communicate with you about products, services, and events;
Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our services.

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing
content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third-party vendors and service providers who need access to such information to carry out work on our behalf (e.g., payment processors, KYC verification services). We may also share information in response to a request for information if we believe disclosure is in accordance with, or required by, any applicable law or legal process.

sections.title: 4. Security
content: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.p1: Optivus Protocol is advancing the next phase of Web3 through a combination of sustainable tokenomics, fixed supply strategy, and community-led growth. Designed for stability and long-term utility, the OPTIV token prioritizes real-world value, not speculative hype. Our mission is to create a more trustworthy, human-centered digital economy by rewarding meaningful participation and removing predatory mechanics from the Web3 equation.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.p1: The Web3 ecosystem has grown rapidly—but often at the cost of long-term sustainability, user trust, and meaningful utility. Optivus Protocol introduces a new standard: a fixed-supply, deflation-aware store-of-value token (OPTIV) that incentivizes holding, strengthens network participation, and aligns with real economic principles.

visionMission.title: 2. Vision & Mission
visionMission.visionText: To establish OPTIV as a modern digital store of value—scarce, secure, and scalable.
visionMission.missionText: To empower users through fair tokenomics, transparent rewards, and long-term alignment, creating a decentralized ecosystem that benefits contributors, not just early adopters or speculators.

tokenomics.title: 4. Tokenomics Design
tokenomics.sovText: Unlike volatile, hype-based tokens, OPTIV is engineered to be held:
sovPoints: Fixed Max Supply: 10 billion OPTIV – no inflation.
Deflationary Potential: Burnable via transactions, fees, or governance-triggered.
Staking-Ready: Optional yield mechanics via existing pool, not inflation.
tokenomics.sovConclusion: This model supports long-term trust and minimizes price volatility.
tokenomics.pool1Text2: Provides price stability, ideal for long-term holders
tokenomics.pool2Text2: Reduces SOL exposure risk during market downturns

growthEngine.title: 5. Referral-Based Growth Engine
growthEngine.p1: Traditional crypto projects reward only buyers. Optivus rewards contributors.
growthEngine.p2: This system makes the Web3 onboarding process inclusive, transparent, and human-first.

advancedTokenomics.title: 6. Advanced Tokenomics with Purpose
listItems: Fair Distribution: No hidden minting or unfair insider allocations
Transparency: Public access to token flow, reserves, and rewards
Treasury-Controlled Reserves: Reserved funds for development, marketing, and stabilization

optionalFeatures.title: 7. Optional Features for Sustainable Expansion
optionalFeatures.burnText: Manual or automated burns possible from:
optionalFeatures.burnGoal: Goal: Encourage long-term scarcity and value growth
stakingList: No new token emissions — rewards sourced from existing token pool

positioning.title: 8. Strategic Positioning
positioning.identity: Core Identity: "The modern store of value: scarce, secure, scalable."

marketFit.title: 9. Market Fit & Target Audiences
audiences: Long-Term Holders—Asset protection, fixed supply, staking options
Crypto Newcomers—Clean design, clear use case, trust-first approach
Global Audiences—Hedge against inflation, store of value in unstable markets

governance.title: 10. Governance & Community
governance.p1: Optivus Protocol is built on community-first principles. Future updates include:
governance.p2: All designed to give real power back to users, not centralized teams.

closing.title: 12. Closing Thoughts
closing.p1: Optivus Protocol isn't just another token. It's a movement to reclaim what crypto was meant to be—transparent, fair, and empowering. With robust tokenomics, sustainable design, and community-aligned incentives, OPTIV is laying the foundation for a more stable and rewarding digital economy.

termsPage.title: Optivus Protocol Program Terms of Service
termsPage.intro: Welcome to the Optivus Protocol Referral Program ("Program"). This Program is designed to reward our community for sharing access to Optivus and its ecosystem. By participating, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service ("Terms"). Please read them carefully.

sections.title: Overview
content: The Optivus Protocol Referral Program is an optional feature available to users of the OPTiVision platform. By referring new users who purchase access to OPTiVision services, participants may receive limited promotional rewards. Participation is entirely voluntary and is not required to access the platform.

sections.title: OPTiVision Paid Access Benefits
content: All paying users of OPTiVision receive:
Full access to our exclusive Discord community
Access to staking dashboards and performance analytics
Eligibility for community airdrops, competitions, and updates
Note: Referral rewards are optional promotional bonuses and are not part of the core OPTiVision product offering.

sections.title: Referral Rewards Structure
content: Reward Levels
Level 1 (Direct Bonus): A reward for each referred user who signs up and pays.
Levels 2-6 (Indirect Bonus): Rewards for referrals made by your invitees, decreasing by 15% per level (e.g., Level 2 receives 85% of Level 1 value, Level 3 receives 70%, etc.).
Possible Rewards
$OPTIV tokens
Boosted staking rewards
Airdrop priority
Promotional cash equivalents (via Stripe, PayPal, or other supported methods)

Important: All rewards are discretionary, limited in availability, and not guaranteed. Referral bonuses are subject to modification, suspension, or cancellation at any time at Optivus' sole discretion.

sections.title: Program Rules & Participant Obligations
content: This Program is a promotional campaign—not an income opportunity or investment program. Participants must agree to the following:
Creating multiple accounts, engaging in fraud, or abusing the referral system will result in immediate disqualification.
Referral links must not be distributed through spam, deceptive promotions, or in violation of Optivus' Terms of Use.
Participants may not present the Program as a guaranteed source of income or investment opportunity.
Referral bonuses are not dependent on downstream referral volume beyond the sixth level.
All promotional activities must comply with local, state, and international laws.

sections.title: Legal & Compliance Notice
content: This Program does not constitute a financial service, investment opportunity, or income-generating scheme.
Optivus Protocol makes no guarantees regarding the monetary value or availability of any referral bonus.
Participants are solely responsible for reporting any rewards as taxable income, where applicable.
The Program is void where prohibited by law. Participants must comply with all relevant local regulations.
Referral bonuses are funded from Optivus' marketing budget—not from user subscription payments.
$OPTIV tokens and promotional payouts do not represent securities, equity, or investment instruments.
Participation is void if a user violates Optivus Platform Terms of Use.

sections.title: Promotional Giveaways & Launch Bonuses
content: As part of marketing campaigns, Optivus may offer:
Optional giveaways of $OPTIV tokens to active, paying users
Additional entries or bonuses for referrals made up to six levels
Nominal indirect referral rewards (Levels 2–6), decreasing by 15% per level to ensure fairness and sustainability
Disclaimer: Giveaways and launch bonuses are optional and time-limited. They hold no guaranteed or intrinsic monetary value and are subject to change.

sections.title: Program Administration & Authority
content: Optivus reserves the right to:
Modify, suspend, or terminate the Program at any time without prior notice
Make final decisions regarding disputes, fraud investigations, and eligibility assessments
Determine bonus eligibility, limit rewards, and enforce Program rules at its sole discretion
To remain eligible for referral bonuses, participants must:
Maintain an active, paid OPTiVision subscription
Abide by all Optivus platform policies, including the Terms of Use
Ensure all promotional activity remains lawful and aligned with platform guidelines

sections.title: Acknowledgment of Terms
content: By participating in the Referral Program, you acknowledge and agree that:
You are purchasing access to OPTiVision tools and services—not an investment product
Referral bonuses and token giveaways are optional promotional incentives and are not guaranteed
Participation in the Referral Program is secondary to the core utility and access provided by OPTiVision
You understand and accept that all rewards are discretionary, limited in nature, and may be modified or revoked

contact.p1: If you have questions about the Referral Program or these Terms, please contact us at:
contact.p2: You may also reach out via the OPTiVision Discord community for real-time support and announcements.
